interface.help: Enter a thread ID to keep conversation history between module runs. If left empty, a new thread ID will be returned in the module output.
interface.name: threadID
interface.label: Thread ID

interface.help: Natural language query for the agent. Use this for conversational requests.
interface.name: messages
interface.label: Messages

interface.help: Optional: Unit ID for direct pricing lookup. If provided, agent will prioritize this over parsing from messages. Example: 199
interface.name: unitId
interface.label: Unit ID (Optional)

interface.help: Optional: Check-in date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD). If provided with unitId and checkOut, agent will immediately fetch pricing. Example: 2026-03-05
interface.name: checkIn
interface.label: Check-in Date (Optional)

interface.help: Optional: Check-out date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD). Required if checkIn is provided. Example: 2026-03-07
interface.name: checkOut
interface.label: Check-out Date (Optional)

interface.help: Optional: Number of adult guests. Default: 2
interface.name: adults
interface.label: Adults (Optional)

interface.help: Optional: Number of child guests. Default: 0
interface.name: children
interface.label: Children (Optional)

interface.help: Provide additional context or instructions for the agent. Example: 'Include all rate types' or 'Customer is VIP - offer best available rate'
interface.name: additionalSystemPrompt
interface.label: Additional Instructions (Optional)

interface.help: Timeout in seconds. Defaults to 180 seconds (3 minutes) for pricing queries.
interface.name: timeout
interface.label: Timeout (Optional)

mapper.additionalSystemPrompt: {{if(or(1.unitId, 1.checkIn, 1.checkOut, 1.adults, 1.children), 'STRUCTURED_DATA_PROVIDED: ' + if(1.unitId, 'unitId=' + 1.unitId, '') + if(1.checkIn, ', checkIn=' + formatDate(1.checkIn, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') + if(1.checkOut, ', checkOut=' + formatDate(1.checkOut, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') + if(1.adults, ', adults=' + 1.adults, '') + if(1.children, ', children=' + 1.children, '') + '. Use these values to execute get_daily_pricing immediately without asking for confirmation. ' + if(1.additionalSystemPrompt, 1.additionalSystemPrompt, ''), if(1.additionalSystemPrompt, 1.additionalSystemPrompt, ''))}}
